content: Hi, is there a UK extension for Ethnicity at present/planned? I found an old UK one (2019 I think?) and also the latest work from the US Core (looks a bit different to what would be captured in a UK system to me!). Any advise welcome, please!
hi Alan you can have a look at https://simplifier.net/guide/HL7FHIRUKCoreProfilesforR4DraftStandardforTrialUse/ExtensionUKCore-EthnicCategory
